subject: America's Cup
Boats and Boating
lead_paragraph: Alinghi, the America's Cup winner, was the leader after the opening day of Act 11 of the Louis Vuitton Cup challenger trials yesterday off Valencia, Spain. Alinghi, a Swiss yacht, won the second leg yesterday, finished sixth in the first leg and has 12 points. Victory Challenge of Sweden, which won the first leg, is in second place with 10 points. The Acts are 14 regattas that started in 2004 as a prelude to the 2007 America's Cup.
